::Decapitron/Legtrap/Headshot/Explobody/Gutclaw/Skullgrin/
Triggerhappy::

=
        Decapitron stood up and got ready to introduce himself to Motormast=
er and the others.

        "My name is Decapitron, and I'm leader of the B=
odicons, a small group under Decepticon allegiance.  These are two of my me=
n, Legtrap and Headshot.  The other two are currently joining your assault =
team.  I have heard a bit about you Stunticons, and also Terrorcons, Constr=
ucticons, Predacons and others.  I have been researching so much about Dece=
pticons.  Me and my men wish to join you," He explained.

         Headshot=
 stood up.

         "I'm Headshot, and I'm an expert sniper.  Allow me to =
rid you of Autobots and Maximals, one by one," He said.

         It was Le=
gtrap's turn to describe himself.

         "Howdy, the name's Legtrap, and=
, I'm an awesome trapper.  I'm sure I can be of use," He said.
~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
            Explobody and Gutclaw stopped w=
here Cyclonus stopped.  They went up to him.

            "Hey, we're helpi=
ng you slag some bots, whether you like it or not.  My name's Gutclaw, and =
this is Explobody," Gutclaw said.

            "Ya, you better enjoy our fi=
reworks!" Explobody warned.

            Gutclaw and Explobody could've int=
roduced their selves nicer, but they were so eager to see the Maximals bite=
 the dust.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
         Triggerhapp=
y landed, and let Skullgrin out.  He then transformed into robot mode.  Blo=
wpipe transformed into Triggerhappy's gun.  Skullgrin walked up to the newc=
omers, Gutclaw and Explobody.

         "Hey boys, listen up, don't you get=
 cocky with us, I can have you scrapped before you have a chance to say fid=
dlesticks!" Skullgrin warned.

          Triggerhappy popped in.

         =
 "Skullgrin, let 'em be, I think they'll be a perfect addition to our Decep=
ticon faction," Triggerhappy gave his opinion.

           Skullgrin nodded=
, and said,"Ya, maybe you're right!"

           Triggerhappy went up to Cy=
clonus.

           "Ok, let's get the show on the road!" He said.
